About Upgrade Taxnote Plus Thank you for upgrading! Please use this button again when you need to check your status or restore purchases. Active With Taxnote Plus, you can unlock 15 entries limit per month.\n\nPlease use this button again when you need to check your status or restore purchases. Help Send Feedback Version You can register for free up to 15 entries on the same month. Please upgrade to Taxnote Plus for unlimited entry.\n\nIf you already upgraded before, you can restore it for free. Please set up email on Android to send data via email. Taxnote Data Export You can open this csv file with spreadsheets like Excel or Google Spreadsheets. Windows版の弥生会計・やよいの青色申告、またはWeb版のやよいの青色申告オンラインにインポートできます。このデータをパソコンのデスクトップなどにダウンロードし、お使いのソフトへインポートしてください。\n\n説明動画や詳しい解説はこちら。\nhttps://goo.gl/XoSwFZ MFクラウド会計・確定申告にインポートできます。このデータをパソコンのデスクトップなどにダウンロードし、MFクラウドへインポートしてください。\n\n説明動画や詳しい解説はこちら。\nhttps://goo.gl/xt7aK2 クラウド会計ソフトfreeeにインポートできます。このデータをパソコンのデスクトップなどにダウンロードし、freeeへインポートしてください。\n\n説明動画や詳しい解説はこちら。\nhttps://goo.gl/PFDe8U
//--------------------------------------------------------------// // -- Help Message -- //--------------------------------------------------------------//
Fast Taxnote is a super fast accounting app. Simple It specializes in entering data. Data Export You can export data into spreadsheets like Excel. First, tap a category Done! Tap the History tab to edit it. Enter numbers and tap Register Select a summary New Message You got a new message. How to reorder Tap and hold a category, then drag it to reorder. You have entries in the history using this category, so the category name in these entries will be also renamed automatically. (Tap here) Ask Anything Hello, this is Non Umemoto, creator of Taxnote. If you have any questions or requests, feel free to contact me via the help button. Help Data Export You can export your data into csv file to open it with Excel or other spreadsheets. Data Export
//--------------------------------------------------------------// // -- Rate -- //--------------------------------------------------------------//
Review Request Hi, this is Non Umemoto, creator of Taxnote. I read all reviews of Taxnote to make it better, so I would really appreciate it if you could review it or just rate it. OK NO Later
//--------------------------------------------------------------// // -- Helpshift -- //--------------------------------------------------------------//
Feel free to ask me anything including questions or requests. I will get back to you within 24 hours normally. Ask Anything Thanks for your message! I get back to you shortly and you will get a pop message within the app. Search About New Updates Hi, this is Non Umemoto, creator of Taxnote. If you love new updates of Taxnote, I\'d appreciate it if you could review it.
//--------------------------------------------------------------// // -- All -- //--------------------------------------------------------------//
Rounded Change Date Yearly Monthly Daily Total Are you sure to delete all of the data in this view? Overview Charts No results have been found to match the terms. About Entry Limit You can try Taxnote for free, but the free version has a limit of 15 entries each month. Please try data edit, Overview, Charts, Data Export and others. If you like Taxnote, please consider upgrading it. Master Add or Edit Books Done Delete or Rename New Name Add a book Edit Name Are you sure you want to delete this book? You cannot delete the book you are using now, please select other book and try again. The maximum numbers of books has been reached already. New book has been created! You can rename it if you tap a book.
Data Backup Import data into Taxnote Loading... Importing has completed. Restart Taxnote Update Info : Taxnote has been updated. Please check new features, changes, and bug fixes.
http://taxnote.hatenablog.com/entry/2016/12/01/071009
Update available Please update to the latest version of Taxnote. Update Later Don\'t show again
Reorder Rename Delete
Balance Overview Settings Carry Forward Balance A previous Balance is carried forward. Finish Date If you select 1st - 14th, the data which ends at the selected date will be shown on the Overview of the previous month.\n\nIf you select the 15th or later, the data which starts from the selected date will be shown on the Overview of the next month.\n\nFor example, if you select 25th, the data between the 25th of the previous month and the 24th of this month will be shown on the Overview of this month. First Month of Year If you select 4, the data from April of the year to March of the next year will be shown on the Yearly Overview. You can also combine this with a day number to show Yearly numbers like 10th April 2015 ~ 9th April 2016. (CarryForward)

Max number is 999,999,999. Notification Set Notification Notification Time Get a notification to remember your daily data entry. If the notification don\'t work, enable Notifications in the Android Settings => Apps => Taxnote => Notifications. Did you finish your data entry today?
Backup Backup your Taxnote data into GoogleDrive, Gmail or other services. You can restore your data when you want to transfer your data to other Android devices. Please check Help about how you can backup and restore. (You cannot transfer Taxnote data between Android and iOS versions.)
